content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to generate an image, which was saved to the "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/a5f00507-375e-477f-b768-9c65169a951b.jpg" directory. Additionally, I received a command to get a text summary of the Wikipedia page about octopuses. The "get_text_summary" command returned a summary of the page, which included information about their anatomy, physiology, behavior, ecology, and evolution. It also covered their physical characteristics, behavior, habitat, and commercial use, as well as their different species, distribution, and classification. The page highlighted the cultural significance of octopuses and their representation in art and mythology, as well as the ethical concerns surrounding their use in scientific research and commercial fishing.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "octopus-inspired technology in robotics"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/octopus-inspired-robots-silicone-skin-can-change-texture-for-3-d-camouflage/", "https://spectrum.ieee.org/robot-octopus-points-the-way-to-soft-robotics-with-eight-wiggly-arms", "https://www.livescience.com/48053-octopus-inspired-technology-photos.html", "https://spectrum.ieee.org/octopusinspired-robots-can-grasp-crawl-and-swim", "https://www.livescience.com/50849-octopus-inspired-robotic-arms-surgery.html", "https://www.newscientist.com/article/2328111-octopus-inspired-glove-lets-you-manipulate-objects-underwater/", "https://phys.org/news/2015-04-octopus-inspired-robotthe-fastest-underwater-robot.html", "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25970151/"]'}]
"""
